name: Stick E-Man
description:
Need help with your computer? Don't worry, we got you covered! With Stick E-Man you have 3 stickman assistants on your desktop at your service.

Each of them can do special jobs and they love working for you. Deploy any of them to assist you with your computer stuff, you can ask them to open a certain windows feature, play a music or even do animation actions for you!

Just like the 2000's
